sections.description: Display a beautiful real-time countdown to any event on your WordPress site with easy configuration and multiple display positions.
sections.changelog:
= 1.0.2 =
* Added auto-update functionality
* Added enable/disable auto-updates option
* Improved plugin update system
* Enhanced user experience
* Fixed security vulnerabilities (XSS prevention)
* Added proper input sanitization

= 1.0.1 =
* Added automatic timezone detection
* Fixed CSS and JavaScript class name consistency
* Added debugging functionality
* Improved error handling

= 1.0.0 =
* Initial release
* Real-time countdown functionality
* 9 display position options
* Timezone support
* Responsive design
* Admin settings interface
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to /wp-content/plugins/itomic-countdown/
2. Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress
3. Go to Settings > Itomic Countdown to configure your countdown
4. Enter your event details and save
